item.title: Today I Learned
item.description: Whatever I end up learning on my day to day exploration. If it seem interesting to me I will share it as a post here.

item.title: Uses this
item.description: Hardware, services and tools I am using to get things done. Starting with my dream setup which I found on r/battlestations. I would like to have a similar setup in the coming years for me. Dream Setup My Current Setup looks something like this. Hardware MacBook Pro 16" Intel: Primary personal computer iPhone 13: Primary phone AirPods Pro iPad Mini 5th generation Apple Pencil 1st generation HomePod 1st generation Lenovo IdeaPad: Work computer Canon 700D DSLR Camera

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: This will be interesting to some people, who want to read some great books and don’t know where to start from. I will try to have these books in physical form and I’ll keep updating this list as I read more books. If you got recommendations, feel free to drop a note! The books I have read and I recommend Currently reading Bad Blood, John Carreyrou Deep Learning with Python: 2nd edition, Francois Chollet Biographies Steve Jobs, Walter Isaacson Johan Cryuff My Turn Jony Ive: The Genius Behind Apple’s Greatest Products, Leander Kahney Products & Strategy Creative Selection, Ken Kocienda Technical books Fluent Python Deep Learning with Python Hands on Machine Learning This concept of Bookshelf is inspired from Manas Saloi and Patrick Collison.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Ankit Sharma and I work as an Machine Learning Engineer @Gram Vaani. Previously, I worked as a Senior Research Associate @Mirrorsize. My interests range from reading fiction, study science, machine learning and building on Apple platforms. Public Profiles twitter stackoverflow linkedin hackernews reddit medium telegram instagram facebook

item.title: Now
item.description: What I am doing now? Work I am working as a Machine Learning Engineer in a startup, OnionDev Tech (Gram vaani). My work involves around writing Django Apps to training and deploying Machine Learning models. Current project: To make an QnA System from unstructured data where a farmer can ask anything about his/her crops over an IVR system. Learning I am completing the fast.ai course on Practical Deep Learning for Coders.

item.title: People
item.description: Internet people who write about a variety of topics. I have tried to make this list of people sorted based on their expertise in their respective fields. Format of the list (twitter | website) Learning balajis | web paulg | web Aaron Swartz VitalikButerin | web naval | web
